name: Lucha Libre AAA: Héroes del Ring
name_original: Lucha Libre AAA: Héroes del Ring
description:
Lucha Libre AAA: Héroes del Ring is an arcade-fighting game developed by Sabarasa Entertainment and Immersion Software. It was originally released in 2010. Konami published the game.
You can play Lucha Libre AAA: Héroes del Ring on PlayStation 3.
